page.title: 20GOBOWEN IN THE FUTURE
page.content:
There are over twenty organisations contributing to the Parish Magazine, Gobowen Roundabout. A music appreciation group has started, the WI has started to prepare for the rounders season, a BMX cycle track is growing and plans are laid for a family bonfire night in November. The village community continues to be busy throughout the years and the new by-pass may make life a lot quieter.
{DOMESDAY SURVEY MATERIAL COLLECTED BY {THE CHILDREN OF CLASS 3W, GOBOWEN {COUNTY PRIMARY SCHOOL. WITH THANKS TO {MRS WOOLLEY OF HENLLE HALL, MR JONES {OF EBNAL,REV. WILKINSON,MORETON HALL, {MRS.WATT,MR.M.D,JONES HEADMASTER AND {ALL THE PERSONS WHO REPLIED TO OUR {SURVEY. SPECIAL THANKS TO EDITORS OF {GOBOWEN ROUNDABOUT. }
